name: usergroups.users.list
desc: List all users in a User Group.

include_disabled.desc: Include results for disabled User Groups.

team_id.desc: The user group's encoded team ID. Required if org token is used.

usergroup.desc: The encoded ID of the User Group.

errors.no_such_subteam: No usergroup found with the given ID.
errors.plan_upgrade_required: This workspace does not have access to User Groups, as that feature is only available on Standard and above plans.
errors.invalid_cursor: Value passed for `cursor` was not valid or is no longer valid.
